content: The timezone can be set in Settings/Calendar. Pick a city that is in the AEST zone, such as Sydney (see picture). For individual events or tasks, select Options/Show Timezones in the event or task dialog and set the zone.
creator: sfhowes

content:
The pop-up is part of the OAuth2 authentication process that is mandatory for any mail app, not just TB.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-and-gmail
creator: sfhowes
